ygData.subject: Re: New Question
ygData.msgSnippet: It was just bad luck but what were you trying to make and what is your skill level at? ... From: Dave Gaines  To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
It was just bad luck but what were you trying to make and what is your skill
level at?
-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 10:15 PM
Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] New Question


>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
>Hello everyone,
>
>I used some bits made by another smith to try to practice my
>blacksmithing tonight and I failed on all 20 times to advance my
>blacksmithing skill. Also, using store bought metal sheets making
>banded armor, I failed every time to advance my skill.
>
>My question is:
>
>Do you have to make your own components in order for your
>skill to advance or was this just bad luck?
>
>Thanks
>David
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>How has ONElist changed your life?
>Share your story with us at http://www.onelist.com
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>The EQ BlackSmithy Discussion Group
>List Administrator:
>chade@...
